content: stitch up this 12 granny square pattern and create a stunning blanket there are instructions to make the square larger or you can make lots of 12 squares and join them pattern details written in both uk terms & us terms file type pdf page size a4 210mm x 297mm language english download will include 2 colour pdf s 1 x uk terms 1 x us terms the finished item measures 12 with instructions on how to create a larger square recommended materials 150m worsted weight yarn in 4 colours i used used furls wander yarn 100% acrylic 100g = 120 yds/109 m in the following 4 shades a - mist 1050m b - bergamot c - enchanted d - aurora 5mm crochet hook scissors this pattern is also viewable on my website don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com important i do not accept returns or refunds please do not copy or claim as your own you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer please do not sell the pdf if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2023 for more information see https //cosyrosieuk co uk/free-crochet-blanket-square-pattern
